Footer.Text2: by someone with too much free time.

Intro.Heading: Hello there, I am Danny
Intro.Text1: A Problem solver with over 9 years of experience working remotely. From my current occupation as a full-stack web developer to Linux system administration to running my own little businesses.
Intro.Text2: I like to refer to myself as a problem solver rather than a developer because I do what needs to be done to solve the problem I'm facing or paid to. I'm more of a jack of all trades with a specialty in front-end development (not design) and Linux system administration.
